apps.name: LuvBuzz
apps.subtitle: Join LuvBuzz: A community that supports your sobriety journey!
apps.localizedDescription: Welcome to LuvBuzz, an innovative community-centric app that goes beyond the scope of typical platforms to create a safe, nurturing space for those embracing sobriety. Our mission is to facilitate meaningful connections, provide educational resources, and foster a community that supports each member's sobriety journey.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to let you capture and share photos within the app, allowing you to personalize your profile and interact with other users.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photos to enable you to choose images from your library, allowing you to personalize your profile and interact with other users.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to provide location-based features, helping you discover and connect with other users nearby who are on a similar journey of sobriety.
